text:
Gladiator is a classic Oscar-winning movie 
made in the year 2000, and set in Ancient Rome.

It tells the story of Emperor Marcus Aurelius, his 
son Commodus and the formidable General Maximus.

This movie stars Russell Crowe and 
Joaquin Phoenix. We already made

a great lesson with Joaquin Phoenix and 
his incredible performance in The Joker.

His performance as Commodus also 
won him great critical acclaim

In case you're new here, we 
help you to learn fast English,

without getting lost, without missing the jokes 
and without subtitles. Just like this fan,

who says that our channel is the best method 
to learn English. So don't forget to hit that

Subscribe button and the Bell down below so that 
you don't miss a single one of our new lessons.

Now having a teacher's guidance can make a huge 
impact on your learning. Like how in this lesson

I'm teaching you the most important vocabulary 
in the scene to help you to understand it,

without this guidance then you might end up using 
vocabulary and expressions that are not so common,

sound unnatural or you might even use them 
incorrectly. So what if in just a few months

you could learn to speak confidently 
and fluently using correct vocabulary,

pronunciation and grammar? Well, with our friends 
over at Lingoda you can become a Sprint Champion

and get 100% cashback and access to 
the renowned Cambridge speaking test.

More than 30,000 learners all around the world, 
just like you, have taken part in Lingoda Sprint

Challenges over the last two years. And you can 
hear some of their inspiring stories of success

over on Lingoda's Instagram. In fact, as a 
language learner myself I can tell you that it

is absolutely crucial that you have the guidance 
and feedback from a qualified native teacher.

And one of the best parts about Lingoda is that it 
is so flexible, you can take classes any day and

anytime. So for those of us with busy lives it's 
really important to ensure that we don't give up.

Plus class sizes are really small, 
there are never more than five people,

so you'll get to speak a lot! And they provide 
you with all the materials you'll need.

Sounds exciting, right? Well, let me give 
you some more details about the Sprint.

So it starts on January 15, 2021. Now you can 
participate in the Super Sprint, in which you

take 30 classes a month for three months, and 
if you don't miss a class you'll get 100% of

your money back. Or you can take part in the 
Sprint which is less classes and you'll get 50%

back. You can take English or Business English as 
well as several other languages and it's open to

learners of all levels. So what are you waiting 
for? Spots are limited and you have to sign up

before December 28th. Now, you have to pay 
a 49 euro deposit fee to secure your spot,

but this will be put towards your first month 
of classes. And as long as you attend the agreed

number of classes, Lingoda will fully refund your 
tuition, including your deposit fee. Now remember

to use our code (WIN28) to get 10 euros off your 
deposit fee, and you'll find that link and all the

information down in the description box below. Be 
sure to read the contest rules carefully, because

students tell me that this is the key to success. 
And now I'd like to wish every one of you that

participates in the Lingoda Sprint good luck! And 
now, let's continue learning with The Gladiator.

If you're a fan of classic movies then 
we made a great lesson with Tom Hanks in

Forrest Gump. You can click up here or down in 
the description box below to watch that lesson
next.

I hope you enjoyed today's lesson, and I also 
want to remind you about that Special Sprint

Challenge with our friends over at Lingoda. 
Just imagine, you could start off 2021 by

overcoming your fear of speaking in English. 
Sounds like a great New Year's resolution!

And when you sign up for the challenge, Lingoda 
will send you a FREE GIFT straight to your email,

which is a Habit Tracker to help you with your 
progress. So you'll find that link down in the

description box below, and remember if you sign up 
to use our code for 10 euros of your deposit fee.

But now it's time to go beyond the 
classroom and live your English. Aww yeah!!
